name: Thief in the Night (EliteFourAgatha)
description:
For weekly jam #235. Theme: Bandit. https://itch.io/jam/weekly-game-jam-235

They say there's no honor amongst thieves. You spent years amassing a great fortune, and now your rivals are coming to steal it. Protect your hard work at all costs!

Credits

Font - Dafont.com/Alagard.font

Treasure Sprites - Bonsaiheldin | http://bonsaiheld.org

Music - "The Foyer", from PlayOnLoop.com (Licensed Under CC BY 4.0)

"Gotcha" SFX - https://freesound.org/people/TheRobotRob/sounds/515187/

"Snicker" SFX - https://freesound.org/people/Leemuffin/sounds/534964/
